site_name: Development Located In The Northern Section Of The Olympic Park On Either Side Of The River Lee (falling Within PDZs 56 & 10). The Site Is Bounded By Waterden Road To WestTemple Mills Lane To East & Northern Loop Road & A12 To North
description: Application under Section 96a of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended) seeking non-material amendment to Condition NNP.26 (Permitted Development) of planning permission (11/90766/FUMODA) for changes to restricting the exercising of permitted development rights under Part 4 (Temporary buildings and uses), Class B (Temporary Use of Land) of Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development Order) 1995
